Wasiq Noor Ahmad Qasmi

I am an enthusiastic software engineer and researcher. My research interests include Distributed Systems, Cellular Networks and Network Security in general. I love engineering small and large scale systems and challenges involved. Other than that, I love to code in my spare time :)

Feel free to contact me at wasiq.noor@outlook.com
